alert.note: Alert for Broward; Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 4:23PM EDT until April 13 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR BROWARD AND SOUTHEASTERN PALM BEACH COUNTIES... At 422 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sawgrass Mills Mall, or over Sunrise, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar and Coral Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
